PAIGE v. SAINT ANDREW'S ROMAN CATHOLIC CH. CORP., 34 Conn. App. 920 (1994) 643 A.2d 312 THELONIOUS PAIGE v. SAINT ANDREW'S ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH CORPORATIONET AL. (11830)Appellate Court of Connecticut
DUPONT, C.J., FOTI and FREEDMAN, Js.
Submitted on briefs May 9, 1994
Decision released May 31, 1994
Action to recover damages for personal injuries sustained by the named plaintiff during the course of his employment as a result of the defendants' alleged negligence, brought to the Superior Court in the judicial district of Fairfield, where the court, Katz, J., denied the motion filed by Turnpike Furnace Company to intervene as a plaintiff, and Turnpike Furnace Company appealed to this court. Affirmed.Page 921
Richard S. Bartlett filed a brief for the appellant (Turnpike Furnace Company).
Vincent M. Musto filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff).
Mark R. Cramer filed a brief for the appellees (named defendant et al.).
PER CURIAM.
The judgment is affirmed.
